Module progettofinale.sailingclub
Package progettofinale.sailingclub

Class ManagementDB

java.lang.Object
progettofinale.sailingclub.ManagementDB
public class ManagementDB extends Object
The class ManagementDB contains all the methods used for manipulating data in the database.

    • queryLogin

      protected Object queryLogin(Person person) throws SQLException
      This method checks if there is a user in the DB.
      Parameters:
      person - is the user to search for.
      Returns:
      if it finds the user it returns it otherwise it returns null.
      Throws:
      SQLException - An exception that provides information on a database access error or other errors.

      This method is used to run queries.
      Parameters:
      query - is the query to run.
      Returns:
      the ResultSet of the query executed.

    • verifyUsername

      protected ResponseType verifyUsername(String username) throws SQLException
      This method is used to check for the presence of a username.
      Parameters:
      username - is the username to search for.
      Returns:
      ResponseType.ALREADY_EXISTING if the username exist else ResponseType.NOT_FOUND.
      Throws:
      SQLException - An exception that provides information on a database access error or other errors.

      Returns:
      the list of boats.

    • queryAddBoat

      protected ResponseType queryAddBoat(String owner, String nameBoat, int length)
      This method adds a new boat.
      Parameters:
      owner - is the owner of the boat.
      nameBoat - is the name of the boat.
      length - is the length of the boat.
      Returns:
      ResponseType.ADD_BOAT_SUCCESS if the addition was successful else ResponseType.ERROR_ADD_BOAT.

    • queryVerifyRace

      protected Float queryVerifyRace(int id) throws SQLException
      This method checks for the existence of a race and if so, returns its entry fee.
      Parameters:
      id - is the id of the race to be checked
      Returns:
      the registration fee returns or null if the race does not exist.
      Throws:
      SQLException - An exception that provides information on a database access error or other errors.

    • queryAddParticipation

      protected ResponseType queryAddParticipation(int idRace, int idBoat)
      This method enrolls a boat for a race.
      Parameters:
      idRace - is the id of the race.
      idBoat - is the id of the boat to add.
      Returns:
      ResponseType.ADD_PARTICIPATION_SUCCESS if the inscription was successful else ResponseType.ERROR_ADD_PARTICIPATION.

    • getIdBoat

      protected int getIdBoat(Participant participant, String username) throws SQLException
      This method selects a boat id.
      Parameters:
      participant - is the object containing the name of the boat.
      username - is the owner's username.
      Returns:
      the boat id or 0 if it can't find the boat.
      Throws:
      SQLException - An exception that provides information on a database access error or other errors.

    • queryVerifyBoat

      protected ResponseType queryVerifyBoat(String owner, int id) throws SQLException
      This method checks for the presence of a boat.
      Parameters:
      owner - is the owner's username.
      id - is the id of the boat.
      Returns:
      ResponseType.OK if it finds the boat else ResponseType.NOT_FOUND.
      Throws:
      SQLException - An exception that provides information on a database access error or other errors.

    • queryPayStorage

      protected ResponseType queryPayStorage(int idBoat, String owner) throws SQLException
      This method saves you from paying a storage fee.
      Parameters:
      idBoat - is the id of the boat to which the tax has been paid.
      owner - is the owner's username.
      Returns:
      ResponseType.PAY_STORAGE_SUCCESS if the save was successful else ResponseType.ERROR.
      Throws:
      SQLException - An exception that provides information on a database access error or other errors.

    • queryVerifyStorage

      protected ResponseType queryVerifyStorage(int idBoat) throws SQLException
      This method verifies the payment of storage fees.
      Parameters:
      idBoat - is the id of the boat.
      Returns:
      ResponseType.EXPIRED if the fee has expired, ResponseType.NOT_EXPIRED if the fee has not expired else ResponseType.NOT_FOUND if there is no payment.
      Throws:
      SQLException - An exception that provides information on a database access error or other errors.

    • queryVerifyDateExp

      protected Object queryVerifyDateExp(String username) throws SQLException
      This method checks the expiration date of the membership fee.
      Parameters:
      username - is the username of the member.
      Returns:
      the expiration date or ResponseType.EXPIRED if it has never been paid.
      Throws:
      SQLException - An exception that provides information on a database access error or other errors.

    • queryPayMembership

      protected ResponseType queryPayMembership(String username)

      username - is the username of the member.
      Returns:
      ResponseType.PAY_MEMBERSHIP_SUCCESS if the entry was successful else ResponseType.ERROR.

    • querySearchRaceParticipant

      protected List<Payment> querySearchRaceParticipant(String cf, Integer idRace, Integer idBoat) throws SQLException
      This method searches through the tender payments by fiscal code, race id or boat id.
      Parameters:
      cf - is the tax code.
      idRace - is the id of race.
      idBoat - is the id of boat.
      Returns:
      the filtered list.
      Throws:
      SQLException - An exception that provides information on a database access error or other errors.

    • queryAddNotice

      protected ResponseType queryAddNotice(String cf, String noticeType) throws SQLException
      This method inserts a notification
      Parameters:
      cf - is the tax code of the person to be notified.
      noticeType - is the notice type.
      Returns:
      ResponseType.OK the operation was successful else ResponseType.ERROR.
      Throws:
      SQLException - An exception that provides information on a database access error or other errors.

    • queryVerifyNotice

      protected ResponseType queryVerifyNotice(String username) throws SQLException
      This method checks if a member has any notifications to display.
      Parameters:
      username - is the member's username.
      Returns:
      ResponseType.N_STORAGE for storage notification, ResponseType.N_MEMBERSHIP for membership fee notification, ResponseType.NOTICE_ALL for membership fee and storage notification, ResponseType.ERROR for no notification.
      Throws:
      SQLException - An exception that provides information on a database access error or other errors.

    • queryVerifyCF

      protected String queryVerifyCF(String cf) throws SQLException
      This method checks if a tax code is already registered.
      Parameters:
      cf - is the tax code to search for.
      Returns:
      the username if the tax code is already registered otherwise null.
      Throws:
      SQLException - An exception that provides information on a database access error or other errors.

    • queryVerifyPayment

      protected void queryVerifyPayment(String username) throws SQLException
      This method verifies payments and clears notifications if so.
      Parameters:
      username - is the owner's username.
      Throws:
      SQLException - An exception that provides information on a database access error or other errors.

    • dateCompare

      protected int dateCompare(LocalDate date)
      This method compares a date with the current one.
      Parameters:
      date - is the date to be compared.
      Returns:
      0 if a year has passed since the date entered else 1.
